name: Interface NewArrayTree
text:
A tree node for an expression to create a new instance of an array.

 For example:
 
   new type dimensions initializers

   new type dimensions [ ] initializers

methods.description:
Returns the base type of the expression.
 May be null for an array initializer expression.
Returns the dimension expressions for the type.
Returns the annotations on the base type.

methods.method_sig: List<? extends List<? extends AnnotationTree>> getDimAnnotations()
methods.description:
Returns the annotations on each of the dimension
 expressions.
